lyrics:
3 contributorsno more tears lyricsverse 1
say its not the end
i try to make amends
i say that we can take our chance
im dying since you went away

prechorus
pain ive had my share ive really had my share
waiting for you in vain ive been waiting for you
but now i found myself
ive got to break my chains

chorus
no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind

verse 2
i cant understand
why you want this to end
i know i got to take a stand
ill never be some kind of friend

prechorus
sadness i paid my dues you know i paid my dues
hard times ive had a few i have had a few
tired of feeling blue sometimes im feeling blue
i turn to someone new
you might also likechorus
no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind
a new sun will rise
love will make it shine

verse 3
now ive drawn a line
ive kissed my past goodbye
i know that love will dry my eyes
and god knows time is on my side

prechorus
pain ive had my share you know ive had my share of
waiting you didnt care ive been waiting for you
and now ive found myself
ive got to break my chains

guitar solo

chorus
no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind
a new sun will rise
love will make it shine
bridge
no more tears to cry
no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind
when the one love you had left you hurting so bad
hope will free my mind
the world seems to fall apart your life has turned into dark
a new sun will rise
but the sun will rise in somebodys loving eyes
love will make it shine
it will light up your way turning your night into day

chorus
no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind
a new sun will rise
love will make it shine

no more tears to cry
hope will free my mind
a new sun will rise
love will make it shineembed
